messages.install:
Please visit the pack website for information on getting started with the pack!
Detailed changes to the pack can be found here.
Java 8 is required.

mod.name: AdminCommandsToolbox
mod.description: Some admin tools like pregeneration and chunk purging.

mod.name: Advanced Systems Manager
mod.description: Advanced Systems Manager is a forked and updated version of Vswe's Steve's Factory Manager mod

mod.name: AE2 Stuff
mod.description: Various Extensions for Applied Energistics 2

mod.name: Alternate Terrain Generation
mod.description: ATG provides an alternative to vanilla terrain generation.

mod.name: AMT Generators
mod.description: Adds Charge generators to Apple Milk Tea

mod.name: AppleCore
mod.description: An API for modifying the food and hunger mechanics of Minecraft.

mod.name: Apple&Milk&Tea!
mod.description: Enjoy a leisurely tea time.

mod.name: Applied Energistics 2
mod.description: A Mod about Matter, Energy and using them to conquer the world..

mod.name: Aroma1997Core
mod.description: This is basically a library used by most my other mods.

mod.name: AromaBackup
mod.description: This is a small Backup mod I created. All it does: Backups. It also works on clients!

mod.name: asielib
mod.description: Utilities for asie's mods

mod.name: Automagy
mod.description: An addon for Thaumcraft 4 focused on providing flexible and interesting tools for automation and logistics, plus a few other fun thaumic gadgets.

mod.name: BD Lib
mod.description: This is a collection of generic code used by bdew's other mods

mod.name: BiblioCraft
mod.description: BiblioCraft adds fancy storage containers including bookcases, armor stands, potion shelves, regular shelves, tool racks, glass weapon cases, wooden desks and wooden chest labels and now add machines, redstone interactions, and eyeware, fancy lamps and golden lanterns. Also Tables, enchanted plates, map frames, and seats!

mod.name: BiblioWoods Biomes O'Plenty Edition
mod.description: Adds support for 16 varietys of wood from Biomes O'Plenty for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mod.name: BiblioWoods Forestry Edition
mod.description: Adds support for 24 varietys of wood from Forestry for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mod.name: BiblioWoods Natura Edition
mod.description: Adds support for 13 varietys of wood from Natura for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mod.name: Biomes O' Plenty
mod.description: Adds over 75 new biomes, blocks, and more!

mod.name: Botania
mod.description: Botania is a mod that adds nature magic to Minecraft.

mod.name: BuildCraft
mod.description: extending minecraft with pipes, auto-crafting, quarries, engines and much more!

mod.name: BuildCraft Compat
mod.description: Compatibility add-on for BuildCraft

mod.name: BuildCraft Additions
mod.description: BuildCraft Additions is a mod for Minecraft which extends BuildCraft in multiple ways.

mod.name: Eureka
mod.description: Knowledge system based on 'learning as you go'

mod.name: Carpenter's Blocks
mod.description: Adds slopes and a variety of vanilla-inspired blocks that support covers, side covers, overlays, dyes and chiseled patterns.

mod.name: Chisel 2
mod.description: A mod that adds in many fancy blocks for decoration, which are crafted utilising the Chisel.

mod.name: Chisel Facades
mod.description: Adds Chisel's blocks as Buildcraft Facades.

mod.name: ChromatiCraft
mod.description: ChromatiCraft is a large exploration-based magic mod centered around harnessing and focusing the power of the 16 colors of crystal energy present in the Minecraft world.

mod.name: CodeChickenCore
mod.description: Core library for all ChickenBones mods

mod.name: CoFH Core
mod.description: Required for all CoFH Mods. Also provides some customization options for Minecraft.

mod.name: Decocraft
mod.description: Add props to the game.

mod.name: Dense Ores
mod.description: Adds new ore variants to the game

mod.name: DragonAPI
mod.description: DragonAPI is a function library and support mod which is relied upon by Reika's mods.

mod.name: ElectriCraft
mod.description: ElectriCraft adds a new way to transport and store RotaryCraft power.

mod.name: Ender IO
mod.description: Compact conduits, painted things and access to your stuff through an eye of ender.

mod.name: EnderCore
mod.description: Library mod used by EnderIO, EnderZoo, and others

mod.name: EnhancedPortals
mod.description: An advanced technological portal teleportation system

mod.name: ExpandedRedstone
mod.description: Expanded Redstone adds a few machines and tools that make redstone more useful and powerful. They are designed to "feel" like vanilla, but work just as well in a heavily modded environment.

mod.name: Extra Bees and Trees
mod.description: Extra Bees and Extra Trees are addons for Forestry which adds in new species of bees and trees as well as their by products and new machines.

mod.name: Extra Utilities
mod.description: Just a bunch of fairly useful things

mod.name: ExtraCells
mod.description: A Mod that adds 4 new ME Storage Cells and some other cool stuff to AE.

mod.name: Flat Signs
mod.description: FlatSigns provides new sign functionality allowing signs to be placed flat on the ceiling or the floor (via sneak click). You can also make sponges to edit existing signs.

mod.name: Forbidden Magic
mod.description: Forbidden Magic is an addon to add many dark-themed things to Thaumcraft.

mod.name: Forestry for Minecraft
mod.description: Trees, bees and more.

mod.name: Forge Multipart
mod.description: Open source library for facilitation of multiple functional parts in the one block space.

mod.name: Funky Locomotion
mod.description: The world in a grove

mod.name: Galacticraft Planets
mod.description: Planets addon for Galacticraft.

mod.name: Galacticraft Core
mod.description: An advanced space travel mod for Minecraft 1.7

mod.name: Micdoodle8 Core
mod.description: Provides core features of Micdoodle8's mods

mod.name: Garden Stuff
mod.description: Make your gardens and landscaping beautiful with multi-part plants, decorative planters, and more.

mod.name: Hardcore Questing Mode
mod.description: This mod will add Hardcore mode with extra lives. If you use up your lives, your world will be deleted or you will be banned.

mod.name: HelpFixer
mod.description: Fixes the help command from mod derpyness

mod.name: iChunUtil
mod.description: Shared library mod required by several of iChun's Mods.

mod.name: Iguana Tinker Tweaks
mod.description: Rebalances and adds new features to Tinkers Construct

mod.name: Immersive Engineering
mod.description: A retro-futuristic tech mod!

mod.name: Immersive Integration
mod.description: Integrates IE with other mods, as well as some useful addition to IE itself

mod.name: INpureCore
mod.description: NEI culling so you don't have to browse through page after page

mod.name: Iron Chest
mod.description: New chests with larger sizes, with in-place upgrade items.

mod.name: Immibis Core
mod.description: Core dependency for RedLogic

mod.name: Integrated Circuits
mod.description: Adds in-world circuits to the game which are assembled by combining basic logic gates.

mod.name: IvToolkit
mod.description: API for Ye Gamol Chattels

mod.name: Jabba
mod.description: Jabba (Just Another Better Barrel Attempt) is focused on providing an affordable mass storage block

mod.name: Java 8 Checker
mod.description: If you see this description inside Minecraft, then you're fine!

mod.name: JurassiCraft
mod.description: JurassiCraft is a mod made to bring prehistoric creatures to the world of Minecraft. It is inspired by Jurassic Park, but is not limited to all JP canon: as many creatures and features as possible will be added! Creatures are made Jurassic Park style, by obtaining fossils or amber, using the fossils or amber to create DNA, inserting the DNA into eggs, and hatching the eggs

mod.name: LLibrary
mod.description: A lightweight library for Minecraft mods.

mod.name: Logistics Pipes
mod.description: Logistics Pipes is an extensive overhaul of the Buildcraft pipe system. It allows for better distribution of items via pipes,...

mod.name: LunatriusCore
mod.description: A collection of utilities for Lunatrius' mods.

mod.name: MalisisCore
mod.description: MalisisCore is a framework dedicated to simplify many processes required during a mod development.

mod.name: Malisis' Doors
mod.description: Better doors!

mod.name: Mantle
mod.description: Shared code for Slime Knights mods and others.

mod.name: Mekanism
mod.description: Energy, Armor, Tools, Weapons, Machines, Magic.

mod.name: MekanismGenerators
mod.description: Generators module of Mekanism.

mod.name: Minecraft Forge
mod.description: Minecraft Forge is a modding API used by alot of mods.

mod.name: MineTweaker 3
mod.description: Customize your minecraft experience!

mod.name: MobiusCore
mod.description: Core mod used for Opis

mod.name: Mod Tweaker 2
mod.description: ModTweaker is an addon for MineTweaker 3.

mod.name: Natura
mod.description: Heyo, Redwood trees! Chop them all day long!

mod.name: New Stefinus Guns
mod.description: A 3D guns mod by Stefinus.

mod.name: OpenBlocks
mod.description: All the things you never thought you will ever need

mod.name: OpenComputers
mod.authors: Florian 'Sangar' Nuecke,Johannes 'Lord Joda' Lohrer,Everyone who contributed to the mod on Github - thank you!
mod.description: This mod adds modular computers and robots that can be programmed in Lua.

mod.name: OpenMods
mod.description: Boring stuff for all that silly Open* mods

mod.name: Pam's HarvestCraft
mod.description: An absolutely huge farming and food mod.

mod.name: Plant Mega Pack
mod.description: Add a huge variety of real plants

mod.name: PlayerAPI
mod.description: Player API gives third party mods managed access to the main player class

mod.name: Pressure Pipes
mod.description: Ever tried moving 10,000mb of steam per tick?

mod.name: Railcraft
mod.description: Redefine your rails

mod.name: Random Things
mod.description: Random Things packed into one Mod.

mod.name: ReactorCraft
mod.description: ReactorCraft is a mod that adds realistic nuclear reactors to Minecraft.

mod.name: Recurrent Complex
mod.description: Adds structures to worldgen, handles exporting and importing structures, and provides build tools.

mod.name: RedLogic
mod.description: Replacement for RP2 Wiring, Logic and Control

mod.name: Refined Relocation
mod.description: Filter, sort and relocate!

mod.name: Roguelike Dungeons
mod.description: Adds randomized dungeons to the world

mod.name: RotaryCraft
mod.description: RotaryCraft is a big "industrial-style" mod, akin to the likes of BuildCraft, IndustrialCraft, and so on.

mod.name: Stackie
mod.description: Stack entities into groups to decrease lag.

mod.name: StartingInventory
mod.description: Allows you to define a list of items that will be given to the player when starting new worlds.

mod.name: Statues
mod.description: Adds a hammer used to craft Statues.

mod.name: Steve's Workshop
mod.description: Adds a modular production table for crafting and smelting

mod.name: Storage Drawers
mod.description: Multi-drawer storage blocks for quick storage and retrieval.

mod.name: Storage Drawers: Biomes O' Plenty Pack
mod.description: Adds additional wood styles from the Biomes O' Plenty mod.

mod.name: Storage Drawers: Natura Pack
mod.description: Adds additional wood styles from the Natura mod.

mod.name: Storage Drawers: Forestry Pack
mod.description: Adds additional wood styles from the Forestry mod.

mod.name: The BigTrees Mod
mod.description: Adds larger trees to Minecraft, enhancing dimensional complexity and atmophsere.

mod.name: Tinkers' Construct
mod.description: A little of this, a little of that, a lot of tinkering, and a lot of tools

mod.name: Thaumcraft
mod.description: Adding a touch of magic to Minecraft

mod.name: Thaumcraft Gates
mod.description: A small mod that adds BuildCraft gates interaction with Thaumcraft blocks!

mod.name: Thaumic Energistics
mod.description: The digital age could use some magic

mod.name: Thaumic Horizons
mod.description: Pushing the boundaries of magic

mod.name: Thaumic Tinkerer
mod.description: An addon to Thaumcraft 4, implementing new content. This mod is a spiritual successor to Elemental Tinkerer. Researches that come from this mod are prefixed by [TT].

mod.name: Thermal Foundation
mod.description: The foundation of a Thermally enhanced world!

mod.name: The Twilight Forest
mod.description: An enchanted forest dimension.

mod.name: Waila
mod.description: All your data are belong to us.

mod.name: WAILA Plugins
mod.description: WAILA plugins for various mods, such as Blood Magic, Magical Crops, and Forestry!

mod.name: Waila Harvestability
mod.description: An add-on for Waila that adds information about the harvestability of what you are looking at

mod.name: Ztones
mod.description: Decorative Blocks

mod.name: -- Mob Mods --
mod.description: These mods add additional mobs, but may cause more lag on servers.

mod.name: Animals+
mod.description: Adds new sorts of life to Minecraft.

mod.name: Headcrumbs
mod.description: Adds heads (and stuff)!

mod.name: VoidMonster
mod.description: Void Monster adds a creature to the void which will pursue you for as long as it lives.

mod.name: Dark Menagerie
mod.description: Adds a bunch of mobs to Minecraft that fit in with vanilla and not be distracting.

mod.name: Ender Zoo
mod.description: More Mobs

mod.name: Grimoire of Gaia 3
mod.description: Adds mobs, monsters and monster girls.

mod.name: -- Difficulty Mods --
mod.description: These mods increase the pack difficulty. Highly recommended but not required.

mod.name: Hunger Overhaul
mod.description: Hunger mechanics overhauled

mod.name: Better Sleeping
mod.description: Overhauling how sleeping works. Sleep during the day but not too much!

mod.name: The Spice of Life
mod.description: Encourages dietary variety through diminishing returns.

mod.name: Special AI
mod.description: Adds additional AI patterns to mobs to make the game more challenging. 'Passive' mobs will fight back, monsters will break light sources and wooden doors, some mobs gain random extra abilities, and villages are more... village-y.

mod.name: Zombie Awareness
mod.description: Smarter more aware zombies (and skeletons), they track you down via blood scent, sound, and light source awareness, config lets you pick and choose what features to have.

mod.name: CoroUtil
mod.description: This mod is a giant collection of common code used between all my mods.

mod.name: -- Minimap Mods --
mod.description: Minimap mods.

mod.name: JourneyMap Unlimited
mod.description: JourneyMap Unlimited Edition: Real-time map in-game or in a web browser as you explore.

mod.name: JourneyMap Fairplay
mod.description: JourneyMap FairPlay Edition: Real-time map in-game or in a web browser as you explore.

mod.name: Opis
mod.description: Contextual server profiler

mod.name: Morpheus
mod.description: Morpheus is a server-only mod that adds sleep voting to a forge based server. When a player sleeps, all other players in the same dimension are notified so it is easier to coordinate.

mod.name: Forge Essentials
mod.description: A suite of server mods for Minecraft Forge

mod.name: JourneyMapServer
mod.description: Server-Side control for JourneyMap Features

mod.name: -- Utility Mods --
mod.description: Utility mods.

mod.name: EiraIRC
mod.description: An IRC Connector that works both on clients and servers independently, with some community-friendly extra features.

mod.name: FastCraft
mod.description: FastCraft optimizes MineCraft in various ways, visit the homepage for further details and support.

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: Tweaks to inventory handling for ease of use, including sorting and automatic replacement of broken tools or exhausted stacks of items.

mod.name: NEI Addons
mod.description: Adds in mod integration into NEI by showing bee breeding information as well as other helpful mod plugins.

mod.name: NEI Integration
mod.description: NEI handlers for all of the mods, one at a time.

mod.name: NotEnoughItems
mod.description: Allows you to quickly and easily look up recipes and uses for any item in Minecraft included modded items. Also allows easy spawning of items and a range of one click utilities.

mod.name: TC Node Tracker
mod.description: Tracks scanned nodes for Thaumcraft

mod.name: Thaumcraft NEI Plugin
mod.description: NEI Integration for Thaumcraft 4.

mod.name: TiC Tooltips
mod.description: A simple client-side add-on for Tinkers' Construct that adds relevant stats to all tool part tooltips.

mod.name: Zyin's HUD
mod.description: Adds various utilities and enhancements to make your life easier. Designed with the advanced Minecrafter in mind

mod.name: Fog Nerf
mod.description: Reduces water and lava fog. Removes void fog.

mod.name: -- Worldgen Mods --
mod.description: Worldgen mods. Farseek and Streams are not recommended for slower machines.

mod.name: Streams
mod.description: This mod introduces real flowing rivers, with a true current, to Minecraft

mod.name: Farseek
mod.description: An API for the Streams mod

mod.name: CodeChickenLib
mod.description: Needed for ChickenBones mods

mod.name: Apache Commons Codec
mod.description: Apache Commons Codec (TM) software provides implementations of common encoders and decoders such as Base64, Hex, Phonetic and URLs

mod.name: Apache Commons Compress
mod.description: The Apache Commons Compress library defines an API for working with ar, cpio, Unix dump, tar, zip, gzip, XZ, Pack200, bzip2, 7z, arj, lzma, snappy, DEFLATE and Z files.

mod.name: bspkrsCore
mod.description: Shared classes used in the mods maintained by bspkrs.

mod.name: Baubles
mod.description: Adding a touch of bling to Minecraft

mod.name: PotionExtension
mod.description: Extend Potion Array
